remarks: A version of ~ fvelrnb using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
fvelrnbf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
fvelrnbf.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
fvelrnbf.3 $e |- F/_ x F $.
fvelrnbf $p |- ( F Fn A -> ( B e. ran F <-> E. x e. A ( F ` x ) = B ) ) $.
